Plot: In November 1984, the Soviet Union's best submarine captain in their newest sub violates orders and heads for the USA. Is he trying to defect or to start a war?
Title: The Hunt for Red October
Writer: Tom Clancy (novel), Larry Ferguson (screenplay), Donald Stewart (screenplay)
Actors: Sean Connery, Alec Baldwin, Scott Glenn, Sam Neill
tomatoConsensus: Perfectly cast and packed with suspense, The Hunt for Red October is an old-fashioned submarine thriller with plenty of firepower to spare.
